overview: Gatite is a non-binary trans chick, who questions ideological utopias and proposes an escape through fantastic ideas, poetry, digital art, animation and virtual collage that crosses universes, the Buenos Aires Pampean plain, the edges that separate the city from the country, the frontier spaces, the heterotopic spaces, the margins, the shortcuts, the cuir universe, punk, naive and anarchic transfeminism.
title: #vidagattite
